name: Alwafaa Group
description:
Alwafaa Group started its operations in Dubai, UAE in 2002. With offices in Dubai and Kuwait and a work force of more than 35 professionals and growing frequently, we have a strong base of more than 3000 customers for various products and services.
Being an ISO 2008 Certified & Google Certified Partner, Alwafaa provides cutting-edge innovative solutions in various spectrums like Software Development, Mobile application development, Website Design and Development, Digital Marketing (SEO,SEM,SMM), Hosting Solutions with our workforce of more than 35 professionals.
